objects.text:
• Premium wool-blend fabric
• Elegant camel color
• Oversized modern silhouette
• Classic wide lapel design

product_details.name: Luxurious Oversized Wool Blend Coat - Timeless Elegance in Camel
product_details.description:
• Premium wool-blend fabric for warmth and sophistication
• Elegant camel color perfect for versatile styling
• Oversized silhouette with dropped shoulders for modern appeal
• Wide lapel collar design adds classic charm
• Single-button closure for effortless wear
• Deep side pockets for functionality
• Cuffed sleeves for refined detail
• Mid-length cut suitable for professional and casual settings
• Perfect layering piece for fall/winter wardrobe
• Available in sizes XS-XL
• Easy-care fabric composition
• Pairs beautifully with both formal and casual attire

banner_details:
This banner has an elegant and minimalistic layout that emphasizes sophistication and high-end fashion. A stylish product image is positioned on the right side, overlapping the bottom section of the canvas to create depth. The background features layered rectangles and soft geometric accents, adding a refined visual texture with diagonal lines and semi-transparent circles.

The heading (`heading`) is bold and prominent in dark brown, followed by a lighter subheading (`subheading`) in serif font, and a clear supporting line (`tagline`) just beneath. A detailed description list (`description`) highlights product features in smaller font. 

At the bottom left, the price text (`price`) sits within a translucent circle, next to a bold rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) containing the text `SHOP NOW` (`cta`). 

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream: `#F0E6DA`
- Warm Taupe: `#8B7E6D`
- Deep Coffee Brown: `#5D4B35`
- Muted Beige: `#D9C2A7`
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated and minimalistic color palette, ideal for a high-end fashion advertisement banner. The dominant camel beige color of the coat and trousers (Hex: #C3A98E) conveys warmth and elegance, while a crisp white shirt (Hex: #FFFFFF) adds contrast and clean lines. Accents like gold buttons and jewelry (Hex: #D4AF37) add a touch of luxury. Subtle olive green heels (Hex: #3E4B3A) introduce muted depth, blending harmoniously with the overall neutral tones. These colors are seamlessly layered to highlight the sophistication of the outfit and can be used in advertisements to convey style, professionalism, and timeless fashion.
